name: Paarai Palli
description: Paarai Palli Mathavalayam typically translates to Rock Mosque in English. It refers to a mosque located in a place known for its rocky terrain or perhaps built on a rock formation. Such mosques are not uncommon in areas where natural rock formations are prominent, and they often hold cultural and historical significance in the local community for their unique setting and architectural adaptation to the natural surroundings.
location: 6FGH+9Q5, Mytheen Puram, Kozhipannai, Madhavalayam, Tamil Nadu 629302
